name: EOD Historical Data
description: Provides access to financial market data via the EOD Historical Data API (eodhd.com).

operations.name: Get User Information
operations.description: Retrieves information about the API user account.

operations.name: Get End-of-Day Historical Data
operations.description: Fetches end-of-day historical stock data for a specific symbol.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The start date for the data (YYYY-MM-DD).

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The end date for the data (YYYY-MM-DD).

operations.name: Get Fundamental Data
operations.description: Retrieves fundamental data for a specific symbol.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Specific fundamental data section to retrieve.

operations.name: Get Intraday Historical Data
operations.description: Fetches intraday historical data for a specific symbol.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: The time interval for the data.

operations.name: Get Real-Time Data
operations.description: Fetches live or delayed stock data for one or more symbols.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: A single stock symbol or multiple symbols separated by commas.

operations.name: Get Exchanges List
operations.description: Retrieves the list of supported stock exchanges.
